name: Baptiste
description: Baptiste wields an assortment of experimental devices and weaponry to keep allies alive and eliminate threats under fierce conditions. A battle-hardened combat medic, he is just as capable of saving lives as he is of taking out the enemy.

abilities.name: Regenerative Burst
abilities.description: Activate to heal yourself and nearby allies instantly, with additional healing over time. Instant heal is doubled for targets less than half health.

abilities.name: Immortality Field
abilities.description: Toss a device that prevents allies from dying. The device can be destroyed.

abilities.name: Amplification Matrix
abilities.description: Project a matrix that doubles the damage and healing effects of allied projectiles.

story: An elite combat medic, Baptiste was lured into Talon by the promise of easy riches. Later, disgusted with what he had done, he deserted Talon to forge a new path for himself. Now he works toward a better world, healing where he can and fighting when he must.
